name: The College Experience
description:
Welcome to Wayfield University!

Will you fall for Rory, the always happy party goer?

Or will Veronica, the hardworking student catch your eye?

Maybe, you're intrigued by  football captain, Clint?

Perhaps Kate, the quiet musician and writer will be the one for you?

Or does geeky Ben have your heart?

Maybe even Queen B, Madison, will have your head turned?

Download the College Experience and find out!

Currently only chapter 1 is available but soon to be added more!
